content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The main target image shows two separate structures:

1. Left Structure (Red and Yellow Tower):
   - Total blocks: 5 blocks
   - Layers: 3 layers
   - Colors: Red and yellow

2. Right Structure (Orange and Blue House):
   - Total blocks: a collection of 7 blocks
   - Various shapes in orange and blue colors

## Spatial Relationships Description

### Left Structure (Red and Yellow Tower):
- Base layer: A red block with two arched openings (tunnel-like)
- Middle layer: A yellow rectangular block placed horizontally across the red base
- Top layer: A red block with a circular hole topped with a yellow rectangular block

### Right Structure (Orange and Blue House):
- Central element: A tall orange cylindrical block topped with an orange triangular roof piece
- Surrounding elements: Two blue rectangular blocks on either side of the cylinder
- Additional orange triangular/wedge blocks on the sides

# Selected Blocks from Dictionary

## For Left Structure (Red and Yellow Tower):
- Base: Block index 3 (red block with two arches)
- Middle: Block index 7 (yellow rectangular block)
- Top layer red: Block index 5 (red block with circular hole)
- Top yellow: Block index 7 (yellow rectangular block)

## For Right Structure (Orange and Blue House):
- Center cylinder: Block index 8 (orange cylindrical block)
- Roof: Block index 12 (orange triangular block)
- Blue blocks: Block index 6 (blue rectangular block) - used twice
- Side wedges: Block indices 14, 15, and 16 (orange triangular/wedge blocks)

# Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 3
   Step2: Move block with index 7
   Step3: Move block with index 5
   Step4: Move block with index 7
   Step5: Move block with index 8
   Step6: Move block with index 12
   Step7: Move block with index 6
   Step8: Move block with index 6
   Step9: Move block with index 14
   Step10: Move block with index 15
   Step11: Move block with index 16
}
```

This assembly order builds the left tower first (steps 1-4) and then constructs the right house structure (steps 5-11).
